About us
Why we are a top OEM manufactuer?
Qi | MFi | USB IF | BSCI | ISO/TS 16949:2009-certified
An Electronics Solution Company
Lontion is an electronics solution company providing comprehensive product development, design, manufacture and delivery services to global distributors and branded customers. We continuously improve our core competency in the area of design, supply chain management and customer service in order to maximize customer value and build long-term partnerships.
Meeting MFi, Qi, CE, FCC and RoHS ,Reach, Ca+65 Standards
We have 20 QC auditors with four years of experience. They conduct battery testing and 100% checking to ensure high quality. Our main materials are all sourced from Taiwan and South Korea. And for your added assurance, our operations run according to ISO 9001:2008, ISO/TS 16949 guidelines, and all of our products are compliant with CE, FCC and RoHS standards.
Get Benefited from Our Advantage
You can benefit from our advantages, which include:
1.A complete product range including mobile accessories, MFi cables, digital earphones, type C series and HDMI cables
2.A strong R&D team composed of more than eight years' experienced engineers
3.Average of three new designs released monthly
4.Stringent QC procedures conducted by more than 20 inspectors
5.10 injection molding machines, five automatic wire bonders and 10 automatic production lines for a monthly capacity of 1.2 million pieces
6.ERP system implemented from raw materials to finished goods
7.OEM samples ready in two weeks
8.2,000 models available
9.One-stop OEM/ODM services
Contact Us Today
We aim to be a one-stop service center for our clients providing not only an extensive range of quality products, but also a swift delivery service and an after-sales care to match that. Call us now.

results.title: Big Chinese companies brighten 2024 CES - Chinadaily.com.cn
results.content: Chinese technology companies have made a prominent comeback at the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES). At the world's premier tech show in Las Vegas in the United States, they are showcasing their latest achievements in cutting-edge technologies. These range from artificial intelligence, next-generation semiconductor display, autonomous ...
results.raw_content:
Big Chinese companies brighten 2024 CES
Chinese technology companies have made a prominent comeback at the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES).
At the world's premier tech show in Las Vegas in the United States, they are showcasing their latest achievements in cutting-edge technologies. These range from artificial intelligence, next-generation semiconductor display, autonomous driving, robots to augmented reality.
Highlighting that China is playing an increasingly vital role in bolstering technological innovation, experts said intelligent devices powered by generative AI and the internet of things are expected to become a key growth driver for global consumer electronics industry.
According to the US Consumer Technology Association, which organizes the event, more than 4,000 enterprises from across the globe are participating in the CES, which opened on Tuesday and will conclude on Friday. Of these, 1,114 are from China and 1,201 are based in the US.
AI-powered terminal devices are attracting attention this year amid a worldwide frenzy over the ChatGPT chatbot. Chinese consumer electronics maker TCL demonstrated over 120 pieces of intelligent hardware covering quantum dot mini-LED TVs, AI processing chips, smartphones, intelligent AR goggles and vehicle-mounted display products.
The company is accelerating efforts to expand presence in North America by boosting production capacity at its Mexican factory, given that building global competitiveness has always been important for TCL.
Hisense Group, a major Chinese home appliance manufacturer, unveiled its latest ultra light-emitting diode or ULED TV and laser display technology at the CES.
David Gold, vice-president of Hisense International, said at a product launch event that display technology is widely applied in sports, education and medical fields, continuously pushing technological boundaries.
Lenovo Group Ltd, the world's largest personal computer maker, unveiled a full lineup of more than 40 new devices and solutions powered by AI at the CES. It said it believes this year will mark the advent of AI-based PCs.
Xpeng AeroHT, an affiliate of China's Xpeng Motors, showcased its pilotless flying car, an electric vertical takeoff and landing, or eVTOL, aircraft at the CES.
"Chinese tech companies are at the forefront of technological innovation globally, and actively promoting the application of AI in consumer electronics, intelligent devices and electric vehicles," said Hong Yong, a researcher at the Chinese Academy of International Trade and Economic Cooperation.
The latest technological breakthroughs made by Chinese companies in the fields of virtual reality and autonomous driving also reflect their strengths and innovative capabilities in crucial technologies, which will be conducive to industrial upgrades and boosting their own competitiveness on the global stage, Hong said.
Chinese augmented reality company Xreal showcased its latest AR-enabled innovative products by partnering with companies such as Qualcomm and BMW.
CES attendees can join a Las Vegas tour hosted by BMW, where they will have the opportunity to experience Xreal's AR glasses along the way. They can witness how in-car information, including navigation cues, hazard warnings, entertainment content and charging station details seamlessly integrate into the real environment through Xreal Air 2 glasses.
Jin Peng, co-founder of Xreal, said, "In the future world, whether it's in offices or entertainment, for mobile commuting or personal enjoyment, people will engage in work and experience life in new and creative ways."
Chinese tech companies have shown the potential to lead the industry not only in mature categories such as smartphones, but also in emerging fields such as artificial intelligence of things, AR and VR, said Pan Helin, co-director of the Digital Economy and Financial Innovation Research Center at Zhejiang University's International Business School.
Contact the writers at fanfeifei@chinadaily.com.cn

Exhibitors
Dongguan Lontion Industrial Co., Ltd
Lontion is an innovation electronics solution manufacturer professional in phone and computer accessories with over 10 years experience.
Our factory are located in Dongguan City, Guangdong Province which cover area of 9000 Square Meters with more than 300 skillful workers. We have more than 12 production lines to make cable assembling, PD chargers, USB Hubs to ensure our capacity. We also do have our own SMT production lines to match different electronics accessories.
We continuously improve our core competency in the area of design, R&D, supply chain management and customer service in order to maximize customer value and build long-term partnerships. At present, we have more than 40 experienced engineers which include ID designs, electronics, structures, products and projects.
Our company have passed the audit of ISO9001, ISO14001, BSCI and GRS4.0. And we also got MFi licensed since 2018 and members of USB IF. Besides, our products have got the certs of CE, FCC, RoHs, PSE and ETL.
We also have the Vietnam factory located in Hanoi Province started in 2019.
Hope we have the opportunity to cooperate and we warmly welcome you to visit our factory.

results.title: Dongguan transforms from world factory to technology hub
results.content: In 2022, the spending on R&D in Dongguan accounted for 4.0 percent of its GDP. At present, there are 9,099 state-level high-tech enterprises in Dongguan, and the number is still growing in recent ...
results.raw_content:
Dongguan transforms from world factory to technology hub
Dongguan has vowed to take scientific and technological innovation as its engine to drive the city's advanced manufacturing industry, becoming a brand-new blueprint for the future of the "world factory".
Dongguan, dubbed the "factory of the world," in South China's Guangdong province, has witnessed huge changes in its upgraded industry distribution.
Previously, it heavily relied on low-margin processing trade and labor-intensive industries.
Nowadays, the traditional best-sellers in Dongguan's foreign trade, including clothing, shoes and hats, have been replaced by high value-added products such as smartphones, mechanical and electrical products that now account for more than 80 percent of Dongguan's total export value.
The founder of Dongguan's Yutong Optical Technology Co Ltd, or YTOT, was experienced in manufacturing optical lens in China. Last year, the professional optical lenses manufacturer's investment in R&D has increased year by year. In 2021, the total expenditure on R&D was 134 million yuan ($20.1 million), more than double the investment in 2020.
With a deep understanding of "quality" as the core competitiveness of enterprises in market competition, Yutong Optics insists on independent innovation and research and development and is committed to becoming the industry leader in producing optical lens.
Over the past two decades, Edifier has grown from a small team of audio enthusiasts to an internationally recognized leader in audio solutions. Edifier products are now enjoyed by customers from over 70 countries and regions.
"We believe one thing: a passion for sound. Through research and innovation, we seek a bod design that’s also intuitive to use", said Li Xiaodong, secretary of the Board of Directors and vice general manager of Edifier.
Li said that Edifier is also committed to creating a responsible business and giving back to the society. "We help children with hearing impairments discover the magic of music, support young talents with scholarships and find innovative ways to protect the environment."
Dongguan's high-end manufacturing industry grew rapidly. In 2022, the spending on R&D in Dongguan accounted for 4.0 percent of its GDP. At present, there are 9,099 state-level high-tech enterprises in Dongguan, and the number is still growing in recent years.
Dongguan has promoted the digital transformation of over 5,100 industrial enterprises and driven 45,000 companies to move to the cloud. The industrial software and information industry in the city has grown by 118%, and the cluster of the intelligent mobile terminal industry has smoothly passed the national acceptance.
By the end of 2022, 42 industrial companies with a total registered capital of 350 million yuan ($54.8 million) have been incubated and established by the Songshan Lake Materials Laboratory, jointly built by the municipal government and a renowned research institute in China. Among them, 6 have been recognized as national high-tech enterprises.
Songshan Lake Science City, where the joint lab is located, is planned to be built as a pilot area of a comprehensive national science center in the Greater Bay Area.
The lab is committed to studies on advanced science and the combination of science resources and local industrial development, which is expected to help the "world factory" further innovate and upgrade its industrial forms in the new era.

Company Profile
Dedicated in Cable industry
The company was founded in 2011 .With 8 years of know-how in the cable field, we have been able to come up with the latest designs with a superior quality , which is has been appreciated and approved by many by well-known global brands .  specializes in this field and offers a wide range of USB C cable, USB C Hubs. Today Lontion is one of the leading professional manufacture of the USB C cable ,usb c Hub and mobile accessories in China, continuously improving our core competency in the area of design, supply chain management and customer service in order to maximize customer value and build long-term partnerships.
Why Choose Us
Our factory is located in Dongguan City, Guangdong Province, which covers an area of 8,000 square meters with 120 talented skillful workers. Our company has passed the ISO9001, TS16949,BSCI,USB IF,QI and holds different international certification such: CE, FCC,ROHS,65 certificate of California,When it comes to quality control, we follow the TQM .Our totally quality management covers the whole process of the production from quality assurance to quality control. Therefore, we are confident about our quality and can provide strong guarantee for every piece of items exported from our factory.
We have a strong R&D Dept. to support to develop different ideas of the hardware, and we are quite flexible to do OEM and ODM. R&D is the driving forces for our sustainable business success. We have around 10 people in this team consisting of designers and engineers, and we provide OEM and ODM. Every year, we are constantly working on new designs and new innovative solutions. Therefore we are able to help our clients with new market trends to choose from.
Company Vision and ValueOur company is aiming to become No. 1 on Type C cables and Hub industry, while providing concern about customer, employee and supplier's benefits.
